name: DELUSION (William Hardy, Sketchygaz, Tony.Sm8, optionalcritic, ConnorMinnsMedia, lytesander, Lauren Taylor, jordanthorpe10)
name_original: DELUSION (William Hardy, Sketchygaz, Tony.Sm8, optionalcritic, ConnorMinnsMedia, lytesander, Lauren Taylor, jordanthorpe10)
description:
Welcome to your nightmare, this is a horror escape room which you must find your way out of a mysterious hotel room. What mysteries hide behind the doors, windows and cabinets? What will you find? You must escape! Now GO!

Open  Settings before playing to view controls / change graphics

Controls:

E to interact.
Double tap E to interact with locks.
WASD to move.

Spacebar = jump
